verses.verse: After <WG3326> this <WG5023> I looked <WG1492> <WG5627>, and <WG2532>, behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, a door <WG2374> was opened <WG455> <WG5772> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>: and <WG2532> the first <WG4413> voice <WG5456> which <WG3739> I heard <WG191> <WG5656> was as it were of <WG5613> a shofar <WG4536> talking <WG2980> <WG5723> with <WG3326> me <WG1700>; which said <WG3004> <WG5723>, Come up <WG305> <WG5628> hither <WG5602>, and <WG2532> I will shew <WG1166> <WG5692> thee <WG4671> things which <WG3739> must <WG1163> <WG5748> be <WG1096> <WG5635> hereafter <WG3326> <WG5023>.
